welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Dodworth, United Kingdom! Get ready to experience the charm of our quaint town, known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and soaking up all that Dodworth has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The primary terminal for all flights at Robin Hood Airport.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: A dedicated terminal for handling cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The north terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport handles some domestic flights and low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The south terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport handles some domestic flights and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply select the network and follow the instructions to connect.
